import { UserDataService } from './../../services/user-data.service'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Course } from 'src/app/common/course'; @Component({ selector: 'app-course', templateUrl: './course.component.html', styleUrls: ['./course.component.css'] }) export class CourseComponent implements OnInit{ id:number = 1; courses?:Course[]; constructor(private userDataService: UserDataService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.getCourses() } getCourses() { this.userDataService.getCoursesData(this.id).subscribe( data => { this.courses = data; console.log(data); } ) } }
